line_1: Well might they loath this rev'rend figure.
line_2: Did not the females know my vigour,

line_1: That He may make his proper Figure,
line_2: The Piece must yet be four Yards bigger:

line_1: He talks no more in Mood and Figure:
line_2: If You take off his Rhet'ric-Trigger;

line_1: Kindly throw in a little Figure,
line_2: And set their Price upon the bigger?

line_1: Nay, life is, and I think the figure
line_2: Will give my argument some vigor,

line_1: A woman came — a frightful figure —
line_2: And of a pistol held the trigger;
